sweet.name: Sweet Laddu
sweet.description: Laddu is a traditional Indian sweet made from flour, ghee, and sugar, shaped into soft, round balls It’s rich, aromatic, and melts in your mouth a perfect treat for festivals and celebrations.

sweet.name: Amul Malai Peda
sweet.description: Malai Peda is a creamy, melt-in-mouth Indian sweet made from thickened milk and sugar.Soft, rich, and delicately flavored with cardamom, it’s a festive favorite loved by all ages.

sweet.name: Amul Kaju Katri
sweet.description: Kaju Katli (or Kaju Katri) is a rich Indian sweet made from cashew nuts and sugar, known for its smooth, melt-in-mouth texture. 🌰✨Thin, diamond-shaped, and often topped with silver leaf, it’s a royal treat for every celebration.

sweet.name: Mysore Pak
sweet.description: Mysore Pak is a classic South Indian sweet made from gram flour, ghee, and sugar, famous for its rich aroma and golden color. ✨🍯It has a soft, crumbly texture that melts in your mouth with every bite. 🍬

roll.description: Pampers is a leading baby care brand known for its ultra-soft, absorbent, and comfortable diapers. 👶💧They keep babies dry, happy, and protected for hours — ensuring peaceful sleep and smiles all day. 🌙😊

roll.name: Bisleri 10L Water
roll.description: Bisleri Water is pure, safe, and refreshing packaged drinking water trusted across India. 💧✨Known for its consistent quality and mineral balance, it keeps you hydrated and healthy anytime, anywhere. 🚰🌿

roll.name: Naga Wheat Flour (Maida)
roll.description: Naga Wheat Flour (Maida) is a finely milled, high-quality refined wheat flour perfect for soft, fluffy, and delicious baked goods. 🍞✨Ideal for cakes, pastries, and parottas, it adds smooth texture and great taste to every recipe. 🍰🥐
